news.title: 'Markets are callous': Why stocks aren't fazed by Iran, Greenland or Venezuela
news.summary: One fund manager described stocks' continued moves higher, despite escalating tensions, as "equity market 'meh'" One fund manager called the current equity market "meh"

news.title: Amazon threatens 'drastic' action after Saks bankruptcy, says $475M stake is now worthless
news.summary: Amazon invested $475 million into Saks' acquisition of Neiman Marcus. It wants a federal judge to reject Saks's bankruptcy plan because it harms creditors.

news.title: Russia says it's monitoring Trump's 'extraordinary' push to take over Greenland
news.summary: The Kremlin called Trump's threats to take over Greenland "extraordinary" on Friday. It added that Moscow will continue to closely monitor the situation.

news.title: Trump unveils health-care plan outline as Congress wrestles over Obamacare subsidies
news.summary: Trump urges Congress to pass "The Great Healthcare Plan" without delay. Congress is grappling over an extension of key ACA tax credits. Congress must pass the plan by the end of the year.

news.title: Trump's proposed ban on buying single-family homes introduces uncertainty for family offices
news.summary: Wall Street landlords are the primary target of Trump's proposed ban. But investment firms of the ultra rich could get caught in the crosshairs.

news.title: How the fragile AI ecosystem may be one of the biggest risks to markets this year
news.summary: A compromised Fed and political tensions are also among the five factors worrying Scott Helfstein at Global X. A compromised Fed, political tensions and a compromised Fed are all among the 5 factors worrying Global X's Scott Helfman.

news.title: ‘It all feels impossible’: I’m 57 and on disability. My boyfriend died of a heart attack. Do I buy a townhouse or a condo?
news.summary: “I can afford a $175,000 cash purchase. I can afford it,” he says. “I’m a millionaire.”

news.title: Play the AI boom without the bubble risk via these ‘transition’ stocks, says Bank of America
news.summary: Bank of America analysts suggest defense, infrastructure and transition materials represent the optimal indirect exposure to AI. Bank of America: Defense, infrastructure, transition materials are the best areas for AI exposure.

news.title: ‘I still have a mortgage’: I’m no longer confident that my costs will actually fall in retirement. What can I do?
news.summary: “I think my withdrawals from my 401(k) and IRA may need to be larger than my current take-home pay,” she says.

news.title: ‘The house has quadrupled in value’: I bought a house with my brother, but he did not contribute. How do I fix this?
news.summary: “My brother lived with me for eight years, then left to live abroad, married and followed his dreams,” she said.
